TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
It all flowed down the drain and the Fremen were killed by sandworms.

I wish for lies.

Wish granted, all statements will be lies. That statement was a lie.

I wish for a better PC for playing KSP.

Granted, but it is unable to do anything except running KSP. That means no shutdown, no checking Facebook... just KSP for all eternity...

I wish for someone to complete this line: "With great power, comes...

Great res- ALL HAIL THE GLOW CLOUD.

I wish that everyone on this forums- ALL HAIL THE GLOW CLOUD. THEY ALL BETTER DO SO...

Granted, the 'glow cloud' kills you though.

I wish somebody made a working mod for ksp that has the early soyuz models and all salyuts too.

Granted but the Russians say anyone who downloads it is there slave

I wish for a pet penguin

Granted, it kills you and eats your heart - That is one vicious Penguin

I wish I had a sword so sharp it could slice through diamond without breaking

Granted, but it has a mind of it's own, so it sliced through your skull without breaking.

I wish that someone did my homework correctly so I don't have to.

Granted. You do so in a country where cheating's punishment is the following:

Launch you into a stable orbit.

Force you on EVA

Make you realize that their is poison ivy (the plant) in the suit

I wish for a a rof hsiw I

Granted, you are now repeating everything you say, but backwards

I wish the wish I am about to make was not wished

Edited April 18, 2014 by 11JRidding
Grammar error

What wish?

I wish for easier retrival of Kethane from Kerbin.

Granted, all you need to do is throw yourself into a kerbal-sized blender to get 455t of kethane.

I wish the recent lunar eclipse was visible from Britain.

Granted. However, the Moon is roughly 10 kilometers from the Earth with enough velocity to hover over the surface... at least before it starts getting pulled down...

Eiririririririririr.

Granted. There has been an error in your breakfast cereal bowl.

I wish Mr. Spock had no pants and sang about Bilbo Baggins during a Star Trek episode.

Granted. It is a deleted scene that is never publicly released.

I wish for an answer!

(nods in the direction of the Science Labs)

Granted; check your inbox.

I wish for a cup of tea. Mmmmm.

Granted. It's cold.

I wish for golden shoes. (Because why not.)

Granted. Your feet sink into the ground and the shoes are lost (forever)

I wish that the wish granting and making process stopped using the word "wish".

Granted. You now have to use "kabafarb."

I kabafarb that there were two horses.

Granted. They were the only two horses to exist. Due to inbreeding, the species of Tangle's two horses goes extinct.

I kabafarb that the kabafarb granting process stopped using the word "granted".

Beeple, but it now has to use "Beeple".

I kabafarb that there were ten thousand dreams underground.

Granted. You can only capture a dream by releasing two dreams.

I wish that asteroids spoke(vibrated? fires radio waves?) english(/radio signals easily translated to english?)

Granted. They cuss at us.

I wish for science.

Granted, you are a guinea pig for medical treatments.

I wish for physics

Granted.

I wish for less post.
